@graph.name: Lucy World – ለኢትዮጵያ ገቢያ የተስተካከለ የፍለጋ እይታ
@graph.description: Lucy World tracks live search demand and AI clustering for Amharic audiences so teams plan weekly campaigns and sustainable growth with confidence.
@graph.keywords: አማርኛ ቁልፍ ቃላት, ኢትዮጵያ SEO, Google ትርኢቶች, Bing የፍለጋ ውጤት, AI ትንታኔ መሳሪያ, አዲስ አበባ ማርኬቲንግ, የይዘት ስትራቴጂ
